channel.title: PI compiler doesnt work
channel.description:
well i know how to work with a compiler but it says this : [code]javac: file not found: .\src\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/code]
inside : [code]@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java\jdk1.6.0_24/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause [/code]
My jave (location): [code]C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin[/code]
Please help me fix it :)

item.title: PI compiler doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

[quote=“Pzezima2, post:14, topic:391979”]1. Have you downloaded the latest java and jdk?
2. Have you correctly set your Enviroment Variables?[/quote]I already used compiler on the server i am running now it works fine… maybe its the source i wanne change to?

Read full topic

item.title: PI compiler doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:10, topic:391979”]@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_24/bin/javaw.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause

@echo off Title Building... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javaw.exe" *.java pause

If that doesn’t work can’t help you cause I fail at compilers lol.[/quote]at first one a message pops up : couldn’t create java virtual machine, second pops to message up : could not find the main class: *.java. program will exit.

Read full topic
